name: Soul II Soul
description: '''Soul II Soul''' are a British [[musical collective]] formed in London in 1988. They are best known for their two major hits: 1989's UK number five and US number eleven "[[Keep On Movin' (Soul II Soul song)|Keep On Movin']]", and its follow-up, the UK number one and US number four "[[Back to Life (However Do You Want Me)|Back to Life]]". They have won two [[Grammy Award]]s, and have been nominated for five [[Brit Awards]], twice for Best British Group.
